mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sdFavorite WHERE 1=1 AND infrMember_ifmmSeq = #{mainKey}

SELECT a.sdwSeq ,a.sdwNum ,a.sdwWord ,b.sddDateChoice ,c.sdfDelNY ,c.infrMember_ifmmSeq FROM sdWord a INNER JOIN sdDate b on b.sddSeq=a.sdDate_sddSeq INNER JOIN sdFavorite c on c.sdWord_sdwSeq = a.sdwSeq WHERE 1=1 AND b.sddDateChoice = #{sddDateChoice} AND c.infrMember_ifmmSeq= #{mainKey}
SELECT a.sdwSeq ,a.sdwWord ,a.sdwNum ,b.sddDateChoice FROM sdWord a INNER JOIN sdDate b on b.sddSeq=a.sdDate_sddSeq WHERE 1=1 AND b.sddDateChoice = #{sddDateChoice}
SELECT a.sdwSeq ,a.sdwWord ,b.sddDateChoice FROM sdWord a INNER JOIN sdDate b on b.sddSeq=a.sdDate_sddSeq WHERE 1=1

SELECT a.sdwSeq ,a.sdwWord ,c.sdwmNum ,c.sdwmPartOfSpeech ,c.sdwmContents ,d.sdweContents ,d.sdweTranslate ,b.sddDateChoice FROM sdWord a INNER JOIN sdDate b on b.sddSeq=a.sdDate_sddSeq INNER JOIN sdwMean c on c.sdWord_sdwSeq=a.sdwSeq INNER JOIN sdwExample d on d.sdwMean_sdwmSeq=c.sdwmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND b.sddDateChoice = #{sddDateChoice}

SELECT a.sdwSeq ,a.sdwWord ,c.sdwmNum ,c.sdwmPartOfSpeech ,c.sdwmContents ,d.sdweContents ,d.sdweTranslate ,b.sddDateChoice FROM sdWord a INNER JOIN sdDate b on b.sddSeq=a.sdDate_sddSeq INNER JOIN sdwMean c on c.sdWord_sdwSeq=a.sdwSeq INNER JOIN sdwExample d on d.sdwMean_sdwmSeq=c.sdwmSeq WHERE 1=1

SELECT a.sdfDelNY ,b.ifmmName ,c.sdwWord ,d.sddDateChoice FROM sdFavorite a inner join infrMember b on b.ifmmSeq=a.infrMember_ifmmSeq inner join sdWord c on c.sdwSeq=a.sdWord_sdwSeq inner join sdDate d on d.sddSeq=c.sdDate_sddSeq WHERE 1=1 and b.ifmmSeq= #{mainKey} group by c.sdwWord

select a.sdfDelNY ,b.ifmmName ,c.sdwWord ,d.sddDateChoice ,e.sdwmPartOfSpeech ,e.sdwmContents ,e.sdwmNum ,f.sdweContents ,f.sdweTranslate from sdFavorite a inner join infrMember b on b.ifmmSeq=a.infrMember_ifmmSeq inner join sdWord c on c.sdwSeq=a.sdWord_sdwSeq inner join sdDate d on d.sddSeq=c.sdDate_sddSeq inner join sdwMean e on e.sdWord_sdwSeq=c.sdwSeq inner join sdwExample f on f.sdwMean_sdwmSeq=e.sdwmSeq where 1=1 and b.ifmmSeq= #{mainKey}

select a.sdwNum ,SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(d.sdweContents, a.sdwWord, 1), a.sdwWord, -1) as first ,SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(d.sdweContents, a.sdwWord, 2), a.sdwWord, -1) as second ,d.sdweTranslate ,a.sdwWord ,b.sddDateChoice ,e.sdDate_sddSeq from sdWord a inner join sdDate b on b.sddSeq=a.sdDate_sddSeq inner join sdwMean c on c.sdWord_sdwSeq=a.sdwSeq inner join sdwExample d on d.sdwMean_sdwmSeq=c.sdwmSeq inner join sdTotalResult e on e.sdDate_sddSeq=b.sddSeq where 1=1 AND d.sdweDefaultNy = 1 AND b.sddDateChoice = #{sddDateChoice} group by a.sdwNum
SELECT a.sddDateChoice FROM sdDate a WHERE 1=1 AND a.sddDateChoice = #{sddDateChoice}

select a.infrMember_ifmmSeq ,(select aa.ifmmName from infrMember aa where 1=1 and aa.ifmmSeq = a.infrMember_ifmmSeq) as name ,sum(a.sdtrsTotalScore) as sum ,(rank() over (order by sum(a.sdtrsTotalScore) desc)) as ranking from sdTotalResult a join sdDate b on b.sddSeq = a.sdDate_sddSeq where 1=1 and b.sddDateChoice between "2022-07-25" and "2022-07-27" group by a.infrMember_ifmmSeq order by sum desc limit 6

select a.infrMember_ifmmSeq ,(select aa.ifmmName from infrMember aa where 1=1 and aa.ifmmSeq = a.infrMember_ifmmSeq) as name ,sum(a.sdtrsTotalScore) as sum ,(rank() over (order by sum(a.sdtrsTotalScore) desc)) as ranking from sdTotalResult a join sdDate b on b.sddSeq = a.sdDate_sddSeq where 1=1 and b.sddDateChoice between "2022-07-25" and "2022-07-27" group by a.infrMember_ifmmSeq order by sum desc
select a.* FROM infrMember a WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmSeq = #{mainKey}
SELECT count(*) FROM infrMember a WHERE 1=1 AND ifmmPassword = #{ifmmPassword}
SELECT seq ,type ,defaultNy ,path ,originalName ,uuidName FROM infrMemberUploaded WHERE 1=1 AND delNy = 0 AND pseq = #{mainKey} ORDER BY type, sort
